name: market for waste polyethylene, for recycling, unsorted | waste polyethylene, for recycling, unsorted | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16785/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'waste polyethylene, for recycling, unsorted', in the geography of Switzerland.;Consumers in Switzerland can deposit empty PE bottles at the bigger retailers that sell PE bottles. The retro-logistic is mainly organised and integrated in the logistic process of the involved retailers. Data for the collection of PE bottles in Switzerland were based on some of the PET collection data, as these include thensame retro-logistic streams. 

Activity starts with the collection of unsorted waste PET for recycling.

This activity includes input of collection containers and transportation requirements to the sorting/recycling facility
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/381:Waste collection/3811:Collection of non-hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Regional market created to ensure that material is recycled in the corresponding regional transforming activity.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Uncertainty estimation according to the pedigree matrix
